SELECT T1.code_id codeId , T1.code_name codeName , NVL(T2.code_wrth,'') codeWrth , NVL(T2.code_wrth_name,'') codeWrthName , NVL(T2.code_wrth_dscr,'') codeWrthDscr , NVL(T2.prrt_rnkn,0) prrtRnkn , NVL(NVL(T2.dlt_ysno,T1.dlt_ysno),'N') dltYsno FROM TC_CODE_GRP T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TC_CODE_DTL T2 ON T1.code_id = T2.code_id
AND T1.code_id = #{codeId}
AND T1.code_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{codeName}, '%')
AND (T2.dlt_ysno = #{dltYsno} OR T1.dlt_ysno = #{dltYsno})
ORDER BY T1.code_id
